meanings.definition: A classical dance form characterized by grace and precision of movement.
meanings.sent1: The ballet was filled with elegant movements and graceful poses.
meanings.sent2: She has been practicing ballet for years and has become very skilled.
meanings.sent3: The ballet dancers twirled around the stage like spinning tops.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as precise as a ballet dancer's, never missing a beat.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of ballet lies in the perfect harmony of movement and music.

meanings.definition: A theatrical performance of ballet dancing.
meanings.sent1: We bought tickets to see the ballet at the theater next week.
meanings.sent2: The ballet performance was enchanting, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: During the ballet, the lead dancer's shoe flew off into the audience!
meanings.sent4: The ballet on stage was like a painting come to life, full of color and emotion.
meanings.sent5: Attending a ballet is like stepping into a magical world of music and dance.

meanings.definition: A group of dancers who perform ballet.
meanings.sent1: The ballet rehearsed tirelessly to perfect their routine for the show.
meanings.sent2: The ballet consists of talented individuals who work together as a team.
meanings.sent3: The ballet group celebrated their successful performance with a party.
meanings.sent4: Each member of the ballet brought their unique style to the performance.
meanings.sent5: The ballet ensemble moved in perfect unison, creating a mesmerizing spectacle.
